entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 7:23 PM NDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:23 PM NDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 7:23 PM NDT Saturday 8 April 2023
